name: Sprint Planning
task: Define user stories for the next sprint
goal: Deliver valuable features to users
details: Focus on MVP, avoid scope creep

name: Retrospective Facilitation
task: Facilitate a sprint retrospective
goal: Help the team improve processes
context: Team has just completed a challenging sprint
details: Encourage open feedback, keep it constructive

name: Bug Fixing
task: Fix reported bugs in the application
goal: Improve product stability
context: Bugs reported by QA in the latest release
details: Prioritize critical issues

name: User Research
task: Conduct user interviews
goal: Understand user needs
context: Preparing for a new feature launch
details: Document findings, focus on pain points

name: Architecture Review
task: Review system architecture for scalability
goal: Ensure the system can handle future growth
details: Identify bottlenecks, suggest improvements

name: Test Automation
task: Automate regression tests
goal: Reduce manual testing effort
details: Use Selenium, report flaky tests

name: ART Sync

goal: Align teams on release goals
context: Multiple teams working on shared features
details: Share progress, resolve dependencies

name: Environment Setup

goal: Enable automated deployments
details: Document steps, ensure security compliance

name: Roadmap Definition
task: Define product roadmap
goal: Guide product development
details: Prioritize features by business value

name: Epic Coordination
task: Coordinate epic implementation
goal: Deliver cross-team initiatives
details: Track dependencies, communicate status

name: Collect User Feedback
task: Gather feedback from users
goal: Improve product usability
details: Use surveys, analyze results

name: Daily Standup
task: Facilitate daily standup meeting
goal: Keep team aligned
details: Timebox meeting, address blockers

name: Feature Development
task: Implement new feature
goal: Expand product capabilities
details: Follow coding standards, write tests

name: Prototype Design
task: Design interactive prototype
goal: Validate design concepts
details: Use Figma, gather stakeholder feedback

name: Architecture Documentation
task: Document system architecture
goal: Enable knowledge sharing
details: Create diagrams, explain key decisions

name: Performance Testing
task: Conduct performance tests
goal: Ensure system reliability
details: Use JMeter, report bottlenecks

name: ART Retrospective
task: Facilitate ART retrospective
goal: Improve ART processes
details: Collect feedback, identify improvements

name: System Monitoring
task: Set up monitoring tools
goal: Detect issues early

name: Product Demo
task: Present product demo to stakeholders
goal: Showcase product value
details: Highlight key features, answer questions

name: Epic Status Report
task: Prepare epic status report
goal: Communicate progress
details: Include risks, next steps

name: Feature Ideation Session
task: Generate and evaluate new feature ideas
goal: Identify innovative solutions to user problems
context: Market research and user feedback sessions completed
details: Use design thinking methods, consider technical feasibility and business value

name: Epic to User Stories Breakdown
task: Break down large epics into actionable user stories
goal: Create sprint-ready stories with clear acceptance criteria
context: Epic has been approved and prioritized in roadmap
details: Ensure stories follow INVEST principles, include edge cases

name: User Story Writing Workshop
task: Write comprehensive user stories with acceptance criteria
goal: Provide clear requirements for development team
details: Use 'As a... I want... So that...' format, define done criteria

name: Persona-Based Story Creation
task: Create user stories based on specific user personas
goal: Ensure features address real user needs
context: User personas have been researched and defined
details: Map stories to persona pain points, validate with user research

name: Story Estimation and Sizing
task: Work with team to estimate and size user stories
goal: Enable accurate sprint planning and commitment
context: Stories are written and ready for development
details: Use planning poker, break down large stories, ensure uniform understanding

name: Acceptance Criteria Definition
task: Define detailed acceptance criteria for user stories
goal: Provide clear definition of done for each story
context: User stories have been created and prioritized
details: Use Given-When-Then format, include happy path and edge cases

name: Backlog Refinement Session
task: Refine and improve existing user stories in backlog
goal: Ensure backlog items are ready for sprint planning
context: Stories need clarification or updates based on new insights
details: Update acceptance criteria, split large stories, remove outdated items

name: MVP Story Selection
task: Identify and prioritize stories for minimum viable product
goal: Define the smallest set of features that deliver value
context: Feature concept approved, need to plan phased delivery
details: Focus on core user journey, defer nice-to-have features

name: User Story Mapping Session
task: Create visual story map to organize user journey
goal: Visualize user flow and identify story dependencies
context: Multiple related stories need to be organized
details: Map user activities, arrange stories by priority and release

name: Idea Validation and Research
task: Validate product ideas through research and testing

context: New product ideas generated from brainstorming sessions
details: Conduct user interviews, analyze market data, create hypotheses

name: Competitive Analysis for Features
